application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by part Condition 7(h) (Submission of details - Detailed drawings of, and specifications relating to, the following: The proposed fireplace, insert and surround to be installed within existing room 'R.00.03' (upper ground floor 'Hallway').
